import React from 'react'; import NormalizedLink from './NormalizedLink'; const Footer = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const commit = process.env.REACT_APP_COMMIT_SHA || 'dev'; const shortCommit = commit ? commit.substring(0, 7) : 'dev'; const buildEnv = process.env.NODE_ENV; return (

Quiet Strength

Empowering introverted women to thrive.

Quick Links

About Themes Blog Books

Legal

© {currentYear} Quiet Strength. All Rights Reserved.

Build: {buildEnv} Â· Commit: {shortCommit}

); }; export default Footer;
